ygData.subject: Re: More stealth nerfing
ygData.msgSnippet: Hmm, I was in cazic last night, when my favorite cleric started wacking me.  Why? I ve been nice to him, ah, he s charmed.  Hmm, ranger is also wacking me.
ygData.messageBody:
Hmm, I was in cazic last night, when my favorite
cleric started wacking me. Why? I've been nice to
him, ah, he's charmed. Hmm, ranger is also wacking
me. This isn't good. So I start charming back. It
seemed to work, I wasn't getting wacked any more.
This was moments before our entire sever crashed for 3
hours. I'm sure it was my fault :)

Llewrend Lynnhaven


--- Rokenn Swiftsong <rokenn@...> wrote:
> From: "Rokenn Swiftsong" <rokenn@...>
>
> Last night in Sol B I attempted to charm a GK shamen
> pet and got a new
> message: This NPC can not pet charmed. It would
> seem that NPC pet's are no
> longer charmable. I would have no problem with this
> if the NPC Pet died
> when the owner did.
>
> I know in the past people have used the charm song
> to break PC's out of NPC
> charm. My guess is this may no longer work.
>
> Rokenn Swiftsong - Karana server
> Master Craftsmen of Societus Argenti
